name: Raylta Syandana
description: A glowing syandana of the deadly night.

languages.description: Ein leuchtendes Syandana der tödlichen Nacht.
languages.name: Raylta Syandana

languages.description: Une Syandana rougeoyante comme une nuit mortelle.
languages.name: Syandana Raylta

languages.description: Una syandana splendente nella notte mortale.
languages.name: Syandana Raylta

languages.description: La syandana resplandeciente de una noche mortal.
languages.name: Syandana Raylta

languages.description: 一件致命之夜的发光披饰。
languages.name: 星翼披饰

languages.description: 殺伐とした夜に輝くシャンダナ。
languages.name: Raylta シャンダナ

languages.description: Uma Syandana radiante de uma noite fatal.
languages.name: Syandana: Raylta

languages.description: ไซอันดานาเรืองแสงแห่งคืนมรณะ
languages.name: ไซอันดานา Raylta
